titleStmt.title: Articles for visitation concerning certain matters ecclesiastical: exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens and side-men of every parish within the arch-deaconry of Sudbury. In the fifth visitation of John Spencer D.D. Archdeacon of Sudbury.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Sudbury.
Spencer, John, 1630-1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Jesus College (University of Cambridge) Library.
